name: CAN YOU? (devbymarc)
description:
CAN YOU?

IF YOU NEVER TRY, YOU'LL NEVER KNOW. FACE YOUR BATTLES WITH CONFIDENCE.

JAM ENTRY FOR DEEPWELL DTX + GLOBAL GAME JAM 'MENTAL HEALTH JAM'.

 A GAME THAT INSPIRES US TO BELIEVE IN OURSELVES AND IN THE PEOPLE AROUND US.

SOLO GAME DEV. ALL SCRIPTS AND GAME ASSETS (ART AND MUSIC) WERE WRITTEN AND MADE DURING THE JAM. 

TOOLS USED: UNITY ENGINE, PHOTOSHOP, CHROME MUSIC LAB, SFXR. *ROBOTO - GOOGLE FONTS*
